dct_title_s: Plan et distribution de la terre de Chanaan suivant la vision d'Ezechiel
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows topography, drainage, boundaries, settlements, places of historical interest.
Includes index: Explication des lettres de renvoy pour le partage du roy d'Israel, et des Levites.
Plan and distribution of the Holy Land divided among the twelve tribes of Israel on both sides of the Jordan River according to Ezekiel's vision.
Appears in Calmet's new edition of Dictionnaire historique, critique, chronologique, geographique et litteral de la Bible. Paris, Emery, Saugrain, Pierre Martin, 1730.
